strapiPost.title: Northwest Arkansas’s Second Whole Foods Location Coming To Rogers
strapiPost.content:
Whole Foods Market fans in Benton County won’t have to make the trek to Fayetteville for much longer; the organic grocery store has plans to open a second NWA location in Rogers. 

  • Whole building: Whole Foods will occupy a mixed-use development, combining the grocery store with retail spaces and apartments on the corner of Promenade Blvd and New Hope Rd. 
  • Third time’s the charm: The project is being developed by SJC Ventures, who also built the Fayetteville location. This will be the third Whole Foods Market in the entire state. 

Read more about this development HERE.
